mandatory_structure.line_4_plus:
## [Emoji] [Section Title]
[Content with bullets]
[BLANK LINE between sections]

formatting_rules: Line 2 MUST be: ğŸ—’ï¸ READ MORE: [blog URL]
Use ## for section headers (NOT bold, NOT ###)

what_to_avoid: Don't put READ MORE anywhere except Line 2
Don't skip the READ MORE link (it's mandatory for ALL updates)
Don't use generic poker slang without GTO Wizard voice
Don't be vague - include specific numbers and data
Don't forget blank line after READ MORE
